hanzi-su-wiki:
納

Значения

Убирать, помещать, получать, принимать, уплачивать; вмещаться, быть уложенным, улаживаться, заканчиваться, быть уплаченным; вносить, вводить, собирать, заключительный, брать, подать

Мнемоника

Последний этап изготовления шелковых ниток 糸. Их в пучках убирают в 内 помещение для просушки.

Варианты

纳
purpleculture_pinyin:
nà
to receive; to accept; to enjoy; to bring into; to pay (tax etc); nano- (one billionth); to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
получать; принять; чтобы насладиться; внести в; платить (налог и т. д.); нано- (одна миллиардная); укрепить подошву обуви или чулок плотным швом
rtega_mnemonic:
納納RS
纳纳		admit, take, receive, accept, patch old clothes, offer as tribute, dedicate
  • housewife inside the house 内 receiving threads 糸 to make clothes or to patch them then dedicating them to her husband
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 纳)
Antonyms: 出
Pictophonetic: 内 indicates the sound; 糹 (silk) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
納入 [ nà rù ]: to bring into; to channel into; to integrate into; to incorporate
納稅 [ nà shuì ]: to pay taxes
納米 [ nà mǐ ]: nanometer
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 糹 [ sī ] silk; thread
    • 内 [ nèi ] inside
heisig_chinese_memo: Spidey likes to let in his house any stranger who needs help, but they can't stay inside long because Aunt May will find out and kick them out.
heisig_constituent: settlement, thread, spiderman, inside, person, belt
Keyword_KANJIDIC: settlement, obtain, reap, pay, supply, store
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: расчет, получаем, жнут, оплата, поставка, хранение
koohiiStory1: Have you heard about patients who have surgery and the doctor mistakenly leaves a medical instrument INSIDE the patient’s body and proceeds to stitch up the patient’s incisions with stitching THREAD? Can you say “malpractice SETTLEMENT”?　.
koohiiStory2: Spider-Man was working as a surgeon´s assistant. By accident, he threw his spider webs inside the patient, causing his death. Fortunately, the hospital reached an out-of-court settlement with the victim´s family.
kunYomi: おさ.める、-おさ.める、おさ.まる
jp_example_words:
納まる(おさまる): to be obtained, to end, to settle into, to fit into, to be settled, to be paid, to be delivered
納める(おさめる): to obtain, to reap, to pay, to supply, to accept
滞納(たいのう): non-payment, default
納入(のうにゅう): payment, supply
納得(なっとく): consent, assent, understanding, agreement, comprehension, grasp
jp_readingExamples: 納入 (のうにゅう), 納涼 (のうりょう), 収納 (しゅうのう), 納得 (なっとく), 納豆 (なっとう), 納屋 (なや), 納戸 (なんど), 納まる (おさ.まる), 納める (おさ.める)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The thread you have inside is your whole supply. When you're outside sewing and you run out, you just go inside, look through your supply, and pick a new one.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Go inside your house or shed, it doesn't matter where, and look happily at your thread supply. You have thread in all sizes, shapes, and especially colors.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You have this supply because Nostradamus (のう) had a prediction, saying you would. And that if you didn't keep a good supply of thread inside, you'd run out.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Nostradamus says you should have a large supply of everything you use regularly. Thread, water, canned foods. You can't see the future, but he can, and if he's telling you to stock up on your inside supplies I think you should listen.
Ru_Meaning: settlement, obtain, reap, pay, supply, store
Ru_Radicals: 人 (человек), 冂 (перевёрнутая коробка), 小 (маленький), 幺 (короткая нить), 糸 (нить)
Ru_trainchinese:
nà: (глаг) вносить, платить; принимать; прошивать мелкими стежками
nà: (графема) принимать; наслаждаться; вносить
Kanshudo_mnemonic: to put the thread (糸) inside (内) you'll need a payment
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: When sewing you can let in a third thread of different color inside to make your product look cooler.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "糸", the sound of " inside " means to enter and make to enter. "Shu-Shun Dian": "Satisfaction in Baiku, Baikui time; Bin in four gates, four mumu; In Dalu, strong winds, thunder and rains are fascinating."

" Na " can mean collection or concealment. "Shu‧Jin Diao": "Gong Gui is included in the cabinet of Jin Diao."

" Na " also means taking and marrying. "Mandarin-Jin Language Sixth": "Kill three but kill the dynasties, and take the room to divide the women." Wei Zhao's note: "Nah, take it; room, wives, concubines and wealth."

" Na " also means contribution and payment. "Shu‧Yugong": "Bai Li Fu Na Zong, 200 Li Na Chu."

" Na " means wet appearance in "Shuowen". "Shu Wen": "Sishi Nana. Congshi, internal voice."
humanum_short_description_en: From "糸", the sound of " inside " means to enter and let in.
humanum_full_description:
從「糸」，「內」聲，表示進入、使進入。《書‧舜典》：「納于百揆，百揆時敘；賓于四門，四門穆穆；納于大麓，烈風雷雨弗迷。」

　　「納」可表示收藏、藏入。《書‧金縢》：「公歸，乃納冊于金縢之匱中。」

　　「納」也表示取、娶。《國語‧晉語六》：「殺三郤而尸諸朝，納其室以分婦人。」韋昭注：「納，取也；室，妻妾貨財。」

　　「納」亦表示貢獻、繳納。《書‧禹貢》：「百里賦納總，二百里納銍。」

　　「納」在《說文》中表示濕貌。《說文》：「絲溼納納也。从糸，內聲。」
humanum_short_description: 從「糸」，「內」聲，表示進入、使進入。

納まる(おさまる): to be obtained, to end, to settle into, to fit into, to be settled, to be paid, to be delivered
納める(おさめる): to obtain, to reap, to pay, to supply, to accept

從「 糸 」，「 內 」聲，表示進入、使進入。《書‧舜典》：「納于百揆，百揆時敘；賓于四門，四門穆穆；納于大麓，烈風雷雨弗迷。」 「 納 」可表示收藏、藏入。《書‧金縢》：「公歸，乃納冊于金縢之匱中。」 「 納 」也表示取、娶。《國語‧晉語六》：「殺三郤而尸諸朝，納其室以分婦人。」韋昭注：「納，取也；室，妻妾貨財。」 「 納 」亦表示貢獻、繳納。《書‧禹貢》：「百里賦納總，二百里納銍。」 「 納 」在《說文》中表示濕貌。《說文》：「絲溼納納也。从糸，內聲。」
From " 糸", the sound of " inside" means to enter and make to enter. "Shu-Shun Dian": "Satisfaction in Baiku, Baikui time; Bin in four gates, four mumu; In Dalu, strong winds, thunder and rains are fascinating." " Na" can mean collection or concealment. "Shu‧Jin Diao": "Gong Gui is included in the cabinet of Jin Diao." " Na" also means taking and marrying. "Mandarin-Jin Language Sixth": "Kill three but kill the dynasties, and take the room to divide the women." Wei Zhao's note: "Nah, take it; room, wives, concubines and wealth." " Na" also means contribution and payment. "Shu‧Yugong": "Bai Li Fu Na Zong, 200 Li Na Chu." " Na" means wet appearance in "Shuowen". "Shu Wen": "Sishi Nana. Congshi, internal voice."

nà
вм. 纳
Radicals: 糸, 内  (thread, inside)
Meaning Mnemonic
The thread you have inside is your whole supply. When you're outside sewing and you run out, you just go inside, look through your supply, and pick a new one.
Go inside your house or shed, it doesn't matter where, and look happily at your thread supply. You have thread in all sizes, shapes, and especially colors.
Reading Mnemonic
You have this supply because Nostradamus (のう) had a prediction, saying you would. And that if you didn't keep a good supply of thread inside, you'd run out.
Nostradamus says you should have a large supply of everything you use regularly. Thread, water, canned foods. You can't see the future, but he can, and if he's telling you to stock up on your inside supplies I think you should listen.
